SPEAKER: Transition Announcer
LINE: And now, The Transcredible Exploits of Zapp Brannigan!  Brought to you by Bartley's Rocket Wax.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I wax my rocket every day.

SPEAKER: Emperor Chop Chop
LINE: No one can save you now, Leela.

SPEAKER: Leela Actress
LINE: Well, what about Zapp Brannigan?

SPEAKER: Emperor Chop Chop
LINE: Well, obviously, Zapp Brannigan can save you, but—  Zapp Brannigan!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: So, Emperor Chop Chop, once again we meet at last! Drop that space gun or I'll shoot!  Like so!

SPEAKER: Leela Actress
LINE: Oh, Zapp!  Tie me back up and ravish me!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I'd like to, Leela.  So I will.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Ooh, yeah, shake it, baby. Shake it like—   I surrender and volunteer for treason!

SPEAKER: Kif
LINE: Emergency summons from the President, captain.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Oh, it's you.  Just let me freshen up.  Computer, captain's musk.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: The long dramatic corridor.  That's never a good sign.

SPEAKER: Scanner
LINE: Glove recognized. Proceed, Mrs. Eisenhower.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Mr. President, what the hell?

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: At ease, Brannigan.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: What you're about to see is highly classified. Reptillicus, hit the thingy.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: At 0000 hours, Planet XXX was attacked by a mysterious death sphere.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Magnify that death sphere.  Why's it still blurry?

SPEAKER: Kif
LINE: That's all the resolution we have. Making it bigger doesn't make it clearer.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: It does on CSI: Miami.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: They fought back with advance military hardware, but it was like shooting BB's at Bebe Rebozo.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: That poor brave hardware.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: The sphere then fired some kind of hellish blackout ray.  Erased that planet like eighteen minutes of incriminating tape.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Oh, I just wish I understood why.  Why I should care.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: Because the death sphere is now on course for Earth! Rowrowooooooo!!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: My god, we're defenseless. Like fish in a barrel.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: Options?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: My instinct is to hide in this barrel.  Like the wily fish.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: Then we're down to our last hope.  A radical new weapon built by a visionary scientist I once dismissed as crazy.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Let's see how crazy I am now, Nixon!  The correct answer is: very.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: Alright, Professor. Sock it to me!

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Top secret news, everyone! I've developed a tiny one-man stealth fighter that's virtually undetectable.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: How undetectable?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: It's right in front of you.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I find that—OW! —to believe.

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: But how exactly is this Happy Meal toy gonna destroy a giant death sphere?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: From within.  This ship should be able to sneak undetected through the sphere's one vulnerable opening.

SPEAKER: Hermes
LINE: What vulnerable opening?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: All death spheres have one vulnerable opening.

SPEAKER: Zoidberg
LINE: Well, sure, but who's brave enough to fly into something we all keep calling a "death sphere"?

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: I say Brannigan.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I say no.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I say me.

SPEAKER: Richard Nixon's Head
LINE: I say Leela.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I say yes.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: I say no.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I say Leela, too.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I say yes again.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I say I shall join her.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: But it's only a one-man craft...I say.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: There'll only be one man.  Me.  How would you feel if I rode rear as your personal tail gunner?

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Creeped out.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Then it's decided.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Are you sure I have to sit in your lap?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: It'll help us achieve maximum thrust.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: I made you some trail mix for the flight.  Also this picture to remember me by.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: You hold on to it.  I'll be back soon.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Activate stealth shielding.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Liftoff!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I'll rodger that.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Did anyone else feel aroused and jealous and worried?

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: I haven't felt much of anything since my guinea pig died.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Death sphere in range.  Engaging holographic targeting.   Activating the Force.

SPEAKER: The Force
LINE: Feel the entrance, Leela. Destination on your left in...  zero point three  miles.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Zapp to Leela: look at all that surveillance equipment.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: We better whisper.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Switching to pillow talk mode.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Look.  What are those huge letters?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: V-GINY? Doesn't ring a bell.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Hmmm....

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: I don't like the looks of this "V-GINY."  Does anyone recognize those call letters?

SPEAKER: Hermes
LINE: Nope.  It's not in the Janeway's Guide either.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Deciphering that ID code is critical.  I'll be in the Chamber of Understanding.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: This is it! The moment we should've trained for!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Holy cr—

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Incoming yucky!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Firing pocket rocket!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Don't panic, Leela! Go go go go go!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I hope this is the control stick!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Captain's Log: We've lost control.  Addendum: Whoooaa-oooooaa-ooaaaah!!!

SPEAKER: Transition Announcer
LINE: And now, back to The Transcredible Exploits of Zapp Brannigan!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Chapter Two: "The Heat Thickens".

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Leela, wake up! I can't face this mysterious planet alone without you or someone like you.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Zapp?  Zapp, wake up!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Leela? Where are we.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: We crashed on an uncharted planet.  When I woke up, I was pinned under this tree. Can you help me?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: If anyone can move it, I can.  No one can move it. Are you hurt?

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: No. But I'm so thirsty.  This spacesuit is making me sweat like a sow.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Me, too. We better strip them off and continue surviving au naturel.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Uh, I suppose so.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Here.  We can cover ourselves with these sticky sap-covered leaves.  I'll try to avert my eyes from your nudery.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: You will?  Eh, what's the point? You'll have to look sooner or later.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Well, I promise not to abuse the privilege. For now, I better scout around for food and water and help.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: What a thoughtful and considerate thing to say.  What the hell's wrong with you?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I'm not quite sure. Perhaps it's the fresh air or a severe head injury.  In any case, I'm off.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: If you see any steaks, that'd be good!

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Why isn't Leela back yet?  Do you think she's okay?

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: How should I know?  And how come you never ask if I'm okay?  I'm feelin' a little neglected here!

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Oh, sorry. Are you okay, Bender?

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: Shut up!

SPEAKER: Hermes
LINE: What difference does it make?  When that death sphere gets to Earth, we'll all be blown to Manwich meat!

SPEAKER: Amy
LINE: Well, I guess it's time to indulge in some end-of-the-world debauchery.  Who's up for an orgy?

SPEAKER: Zoidberg
LINE: Maybe a Parcheesi tournament.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Belay that Parcheesi tournament! I've identified the death sphere! We may yet have a faint hope of survival!

SPEAKER: Zoidberg
LINE: Still, a Parcheesi tournament.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: This is a top secret military satellite launched by the Air Force in 1998.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: And this is a top secret FCC satellite launched that same year to censor indecent TV programs.

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: Like The Pimpsons? And Assarama?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Precisely.  However, the satellites collided shortly after launch and were never heard from again.

SPEAKER: Zoidberg
LINE: I found the board!

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Now, I've simulated that collision using Shrapnovision.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Granted, all that makes perfect sense, but why is this death sphere destroying planets?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: That makes the most sense of all.  Look at the planets it's destroyed so far.  First came XXX, the nude beach planet.  Then Poopiter.   And finally that world that can't be mentioned in polite company.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: You mean...

SPEAKER: Amy
LINE: Aw!

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: How dare you!?

SPEAKER: Amy
LINE: Shame on—

SPEAKER: Hermes
LINE: So the death sphere is "censoring" indecent planets?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Indeed.  And we're next if we can't keep it in our collective pants!  Our sole hope is to persuade the people of Earth to abandon their smutty ways.

SPEAKER: Amy
LINE: So the orgy's off?

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: So thirsty.  Why couldn't a water fountain have fallen on me?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I couldn't find any water.  But the moisture in these fruit and nut berries should sustain you.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Thank you.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I climbed perilously high into the trees to pick them, yet I saw no sign of intelligent life.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Bummer.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Moreover, the crash totally destroyed our ship.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: So we're stuck here until someone finds us?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Alas, that may never happen.  Stealth technology makes the ship impossible to locate yet easy to stub your crotch on.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Well, there's worse places to be marooned.  Plenty of food, mild climate.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: It's a veritable Garden of Eden.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: It is?

SPEAKER: Snake
LINE: Hello.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Did that snake say, "Hello"?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: No, we're both delirious from dehydration.

SPEAKER: Snake
LINE: Just like Adam and Eve.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: We can still save Earth.  People are sure to clean up their act when presented with cold hard facts by rational folks like us.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: The end is near! Repent thy sins!

SPEAKER: Sal
LINE: I'll thinks it overs while I engages this five dollar hooker.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Don't do it! It's not worth it!

SPEAKER: Petunia
LINE: Okay, make it three dollars.

SPEAKER: Sal
LINE: Yuck! I don't wants no three-dollar hooker.  I'm goin' backs to the adults bookstore.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Adult bookstore?  I thought this was the public library.

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: Nope, pubic library.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Zapp?  Where are you?  Oh, God, I'm actually starting to miss him.

SPEAKER: Snake
LINE: Maybe you two belong together.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: We do not.  And you can't talk.

SPEAKER: Snake
LINE: Oh, come on!  It must be an awful temptation.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Guess who just killed a woodchuck with his bare feet?  I thought I'd whip us up some shelter, make this a little more like home.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I do miss the Earth terribly.  I wonder if it's even still there.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Let's find out together.  I'll brave the ship's wreckage to fetch you the telescope.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: That's so sweet.

SPEAKER: Snake
LINE: I'm just sayin' is all.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: I know my new plan is a long shot, but it's the only hope left.

SPEAKER: Hermes
LINE: Well, now I've heard everything  on my eyePod.  So, do you have a new plan, Professor, and is there any hope left?

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Indeed.  We're here on Earth's last unspoiled acre to show the death sphere there's still purity in the world.  Begin transmitting.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Commence purity chant.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Hey, I'm proud of you, Bender. Avoiding sin for almost a full minute.   Bender?

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: Aw, yeah, baby. You're quite a dish.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Bender, stop!! STOP!!

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: Aw, quiet, you riot.  What's the worst that could happen?

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: No!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: No!  Earth is gone!  We're the only two humans left in the universe!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Oh, God, I'm sorry, Leela.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Maybe — Maybe this was meant to be. Maybe you and I were meant to build a new world here.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: We can avoid humanity's mistakes.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Like the tuba.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Yes.  We'll be like Adam and Eve.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Only without the tuba.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: And we'll beget little Zapp Jr. and Leela Jr. and they'll have kids of their ow—Yecch!  Is that really what happened in the Bible?!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: It's a sick and twisted book of holiness all right.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Then we'll write our own Bible, with less Sodom and more Gomorra.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Let's do it.  I shall become the mother of a new world, trapped here under this tree.  The Tree of Knowledge!  Look, it even has apples!  Ow!  Wow!  Come here, Adam, partake of my forbidden fruit.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Thee will be done.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Wait!  One more bite before we begin the begetting.   Mmm, juicy.  Those nut berries you found were so salty, I—I couldn't think straight.  I mean, not to belabor it, but they were as salty as that bag of trail mix Fry gave me.  Exactly as salty.  Hey!  Wait a second!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Uh...woh...ih...Giiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiih—I have a terrible confession to make!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: You see, when I first went foraging, what I actually found was the smoldering wreckage of the ship.  Ignoring all danger, I charged inside to liberate our provisions.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: So this is the trail mix Fry gave me!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Yes!  I exaggerated when I said I picked it from the treetops.  I just wanted you to think  a little better of me.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Well, your motives were good.  And we were both loopy from dehydration.  Hey, wait!  You've been doing an awful lot of urinating!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Ooooooiiiiiiigeeeaaaaaaaaaah, there's plenty of water! You see...

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: ...after I selflessly rescued the trail mix, I braved the flames once more in search of fluids.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Then why didn't you give me any?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I though it might help you forget your intense hatred for me if you were a teensy bit delirious.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: So you let me dehydrate while you washed down the trail mix with imported mineral water?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Diiiiiiiiaaaaaaaaaah, not exactly.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: You see, besides the trail mix, the minibar also contained Doritos, beef jerky and a generous assortment of fine chocolates.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: It's because I haven't been exercising.  If only this tree hadn't fallen on me by chance.   Oh, dear God!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Gluuuuuuuuyiiiiiiiiiiiih, it was just after we crashed!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I awoke first to find you trapped.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Leela.  Leela! Wake up!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: You could've moved this grub-infested log anytime you wanted?!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Well, sure.  But then I wouldn't have been able to provide the loving care you wouldn't have needed.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: I'd leave you to rot in this paradise if only the ship weren't destroyed!  The ship's fully functional, isn't it?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Ee-iiiiiiiiiiiiiiih, you see...

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: ...after re-trapping you and before feigning unconsciousness, I paused to enjoy a cigar.  Though mellow and satisfying, it did parch me a bit.  So I went in search of brandy.  That's when my keen senses detected the still invisible ship.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Ow!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: So we can go back to Earth?  But there is no Earth anymore!  Everyone I know is dead!

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Ah, this seems like a good place to take a dump.  Leela? You're alive!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Fry!  But how did you find this planet?  Well?

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: Oooheeeeeeaaaaiiiiiiih, we're actually on Earth!  The ship's homing device brought us back!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: But I saw Earth explode!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: I'm actually kinda proud of this one.  You see...

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: What you saw was merely a simulation I rigged up using the ship's holographic targeting projector.  The alleged telescope was a toilet paper tube.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: You said there wasn't any toilet paper!  And that humanity was annihilated!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: My motives were pure!  I just wanted you think we had to save humanity so you'd be willing to have sex.  Please say you believe me.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Yes.  I believe you.

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: Yay!

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: There must be somethin' to steal on this island.  Hey, it's Leela!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Let's go home, everybody.  At least the Earth wasn't destroyed.  Yet.

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: People of Earth, hear the righteous word of the Mighty V-GINY!

SPEAKER: Bender
LINE: The Mighty V-GINY!

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: Seeing you frolic in this unspoiled garden gives hope that this world may yet be redeemed.

SPEAKER: Professor Farnsworth
LINE: Huzzah!  The purity chant worked!

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: Unacceptable wardrobe malfunction!  I was referring to Adam and Eve.

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: We're not Adam and Eve.  You see, due to a series of—

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: Consummate your union or I shall destroy Earth!

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Well, if it's to save Earth, I-I guess I could take one for the team.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: You what?  R-Right now?  Eh, but I need a little romance, first.  Maybe a vanilla candle or something.

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: Commence intercourse.

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: The giant guns are making me feel sort of...inadequate.  I'm not sure if I could—

SPEAKER: Leela
LINE: Move it!  I gotta get home and do laundry!

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: For God's sake, censor it!!! CENSOR IT!!!

SPEAKER: V-GINY
LINE: Approved for all audiences!!

SPEAKER: Fry
LINE: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!

SPEAKER: Transition Announcer
LINE: And now, the spicy finale of The Transcredible Exploits of Zapp Brannigan!

SPEAKER: Zapp Brannigan
LINE: That was a close call but we saved Earth.  Was it as good for you as it was for the human race?
